attributes.action: The Ethnic Assyrians Of Iraq - British Government Should Pressure Iraqi and Kurdish Authorities to Ensure Their Rights
attributes.additional_details: The British Government to ensure the rights and safety of the indigenous ethnic Assyrian (aka Chaldo-Assyrian) Christians of Iraq, Iran, Turkey and Syria. Religious and Ethnic discrimination by elements of the Kurdish Regional Govornment, the Iraqi Govornment and rouge religious extremist and Arab and Kurdish Nationalists is rife.
